short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert JPEG images to PNG format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert images quickly and easily with the Image Format Converter extension. This powerful tool allows you to seamlessly convert your images between popular formats such as JPEG and  PNG Simply choose your image, select your desired format, and click "Convert." Whether you need high-quality JPEGs for the web, transparent PNGs for graphics this extension has you covered. Say goodbye to format compatibility issues and hello to hassle-free image conversions.
